project_name: Dify - Open-source LLM Application Development Platform
security_requirements: Data encryption in transit and at rest
scope: Threat modeling for the Dify platform including API interactions, user data handling, and external integrations
assumptions: Users will have varying levels of technical expertise
The platform will be used for sensitive data processing
Third-party integrations may introduce additional risks
constraints: Limited by the capabilities of integrated LLMs
Resource requirements for running the application
